txt.en: Defeated Druggavar or wolves in the Windfells ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Impressed by your apparent power over the evil Druggavar of Enedwaith, the Uch-l没th seek your aid once more.

'Ah! You are the Gl没s Duvodiad! You have proven your power, but the banishment you performed seems only to have been temporary... the Druggavar have returned and threaten our herds!\n\n'Will you go out once more and fend off these evil demons? If you will, I will reward you. Our herds graze there, to the west.'
Druggavar haunt the lands to the west of Gavar Cadlus.\n\nIuan has asked you to hunt down and banish the Druggavar of Enedwaith.
'Once again, you have saved our goats, Gl没s Duvodiad... we shall praise you always!'
Iuan is at Gavar Cadlus in the Windfells of Enedwaith, east of the goat-herd.\n\nYou should return to Iuan with news of your victory.
'O Gl没s Duvodiad, you come to our aid once more....'
Defeat Druggavar or wolves in the Windfells ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Iuan at Gavar Cadlus
